name: RespiratorySupportProcedures
title: Respiratory Support Procedures
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of respiratory support procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent respiratory support procedures.),(Exclusion Criteria: No Exclusions.)
